readingMnemonic:
Words that count days use an exceptional reading. The readings for 二十 are exceptions, and 日 takes the kun'yomi reading. Here's a mnemonic to help with that:

If you make one hat for <vocabulary>twenty days</vocabulary> you'll have enough <reading>hats</reading> (はつ) to fill up your <reading>car</reading> (か) completely! That's a lot of days and a lot of hats.
